snippet: The legislation, which faces long odds in the House, would ensure that women have access to insurance coverage for birth control even if they work for businesses that have religious objections.
abstract: House and Senate Democrats announce development of bill that would override Supreme Court's decision on contraceptives, and require that for-profit corporations like Hobby Lobby Stores provide and pay for contraceptive coverage under the Affordable Care Act.
lead_paragraph: The legislation, which faces long odds in the House, would ensure that women have access to insurance coverage for birth control even if they work for businesses that have religious objections.

headline.main: Democrats Push Bill to Reverse Supreme Court Ruling on Contraceptives
headline.print_headline: Democrats Push Bill to Reverse Supreme Court Ruling on Contraceptives

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
